originalText.text: She’s an amazing teacher if you ask anyone you will be told only the best things about her that’s coming from a Santos daycare alumni

text.text: She’s an amazing teacher if you ask anyone you will be told only the best things about her that’s coming from a Santos daycare alumni

originalText.text:
My son was part of Santos Family Day Care from 13 months of age through age 4. It is so difficult to find trustworthy care for your child, and being a first time mom,  I was extremely apprehensive about leaving him with anyone that wasn't family.  Those worries quickly dissolved. Santos Day Care provided me with  peace of mind.  They answered all my questions and placated my concerns. My son seemed happy and at ease. He absolutely loved his teachers and every day he came home with new knowledge. By 24 months my son could identify all his Colors,  letters of the alphabet, and shapes.

At Santos, I didn't have to worry about my child sitting in front of a TV for hours, the staff not only cared for my son, but taught him and challenged him. When he entered Pre-K his teachers were impressed with his knowledge, and the transition was so smooth since he was already used to a structured environment and routine.

I can't thank the Santos Day Care team enough. They weren't just my son's caregivers they became friends and trusted advisors.

originalText.text: A few years ago, while I struggled to find childcare to work around my unsteady and hectic work schedule, I was blessed to find Santos Day Care. Immediately, I was impressed with the unity with which this family cares for each other, and for the children in this community, whom are in their care. My daughter and I were blessed with this family who took special attention to detail regarding her allergies, and her social and academic growth. My daughter found happiness and I was at peace that she was safe and in hands of a loving family. I will always be in gratitude for your dedication and for how well prepared she finally went to pre-K afterwards. Your presence is a blessing to this community. Thank you!

originalText.text: my 3 year old son been there for three months and this’s the best decision that I make for him, very good environment, very good communication every time I ask a question I always get answers right back, I go to work with no worries knowing that he’s in a safe place
